resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107894</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107894</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205787</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Byzantine Art and Painting in Italy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Byzantinische kunst und Anstrich in Italien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Art et peinture bizantins en Italie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Arte e pintura byzantine em Italy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arte e pittura byzantine in Italia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βυζαντινή τέχνη και ζωγραφική στην Ιταλία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Arte y pintura byzantine en Italia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">tours Italian Byzantine paintings of the 1200s and 1300s. The site includes an overview of the genre, historical background, and information on the featured artists, the paintings, their provenance, a bibliography, exhibition history, and full-screen images.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">italienische byzantinische Anstriche der Touren 
des 1200s und des 1300s. Die Site schließt einen Überblick 
über das Genren, den historischen Hintergrund und die Informationen 
über die gekennzeichneten Künstler, die Anstriche, ihre Herkunft, 
eine Bibliographie, eine Ausstellunggeschichte und Ganzseitenbilder 
ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">peintures bizantines italiennes d'excursions du 
1200s et du 1300s. Le site inclut une vue d'ensemble du genre, 
de l'historique, et de l'information sur les artistes décrits, les 
peintures, leur provenance, une bibliographie, une histoire 
d'exposition, et des images pleine page.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pinturas byzantine italianas das excursões do 
1200s e do 1300s. O local inclui uma vista geral do genre, do 
fundo histórico, e da informação nos artistas caracterizados, nas 
pinturas, em seu provenance, em uma bibliografia, em um history do 
exhibition, e em imagens full-screen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pitture byzantine italiane di giri del 1200s e del
1300s. Il luogo include una descrizione del genere, dei 
precedenti e delle informazioni sugli artisti descritti, sulle 
pitture, sulla loro provenienza, su una bibliografia, su una storia di
mostra e sulle immagini a schermo pieno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ιταλικά βυζαντινά έργα ζωγραφικής γύρων του 1200s 
και του 1300s. Η περιοχή περιλαμβάνει μια επισκόπηση του 
ύφους, του ιστορικού υποβάθρου, και των πληροφοριών για τους 
χαρακτηρισμένους καλλιτέχνες, τα έργα ζωγραφικής, την προέλευσή 
τους, μια βιβλιογραφία, μια ιστορία έκθεσης, και τις εικόνες 
πλήρης-οθόνης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">pinturas byzantine italianas de los viajes del 
1200s y del 1300s. El sitio incluye una descripción del 
género, del fondo histórico, y de la información sobre los 
artistas ofrecidos, las pinturas, su procedencia, una bibliografía, 
una historia de la exposición, e imágenes de plena pantalla.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205787</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107894</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/byzantine-art-and-painting-in-italy</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
